structure.unit: OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH OF EMPLOYEES

law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 251, sec. 22; amended ch. 326, sec. 1. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1958. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1599c-4, 1599c-22, 1599c-27, 1599c-39.

metadata.lrc-note: . This section was repealed by Acts 1972, ch. 251, Â§ 22, and amended by Acts 1972, ch. 326, Â§ 1. The total purpose of the two acts appears to be served by repeal of this section and replacement with KRS 338.015, and the acts have been compiled accordingly.
